Sentence: He (Paul) meets an attractive and saucy young girl, Caroline, while making a rocker for her (Caroline) mother

He (Paul) thinks about asking to court her (Caroline), but before he (Paul) can muster the nerve, he (Paul) discovers that Caroline is betrothed to his (Paul) dear friend Mitchell, who works at a lumbering camp nearby
Paul and Caroline work desperately, selling off their belongings one by one to make payments on the 200 acres
When Granger rescinds his (Granger) deal and seizes ownership of the forty acres, Paul and Caroline are ready to surrender
Paul and Caroline get married and move onto the 200 acres together
